There were no other sightings in Jasper on or around May 31st 1980
divs: Sighting Details WE WERE IN A FEILD ON A DIRT ROAD GOING HOME THENI LOOKED TO THE RIGHT AND SAW A LIGHT HOVERING IN THE PASTER AND WE THOUGHT ITWAS A HELICOPTER BUT THERE WAS NO SOUND MY WIFE AND MYSELF PANICED WE COULDNTSEE ANYTHING BUT LIGHT HOVERINGOVER US FOLLOWING OUR EVERY MOVE WE WERE IN THETRUCK AND IT DIED AND I PUT IT IN NEUTRUEL AND COASTED DOWN HILL AND WHEN WEREACHED THE BOTTOM IT DISSAPEARED
Summary: SAW LIGHT AND IT FOLLOWED US TO RIVER
